mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_NUMBER, CATEGORY_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT_DATE, PRODUCT_HITS) VALUES(PRODUCT_SEQ.nextval,#{category_code},#{product_name},#{product_price},#{product_stock},#{product_desc},SYSDATE,0)
mapper.select: SELECT product_number, product_name,product_stock,product_hits,product_date FROM product ORDER BY product_number

SELECT* FROM product WHERE product_number IN(SELECT product_number FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, product_number FROM (SELECT product_number FROM product ORDER BY product_number DESC)) WHERE rnum>=(#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND rnum<=#{pageNum} * #{amount})
SELECT count(product_number) as total FROM product
